TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Matadim, title = Matadim, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matadim} }

S.FORM: Matadim Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Matadim a niyaro', 134 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 376 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 63% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 237 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 37% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 139 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 61%, Bunun 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Matadim Itiniay i Yoli Cen no Hoalien ko Matadim a niyaro', 134 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 376 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 63% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 237 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 37% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 139 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 61%, Bonon 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
